short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Convert prices from various currencies to Bitcoin or Satoshis.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Satoshi Switch is a user-friendly Google Chrome extension designed to make it effortless to denominate prices in bitcoin or satoshis as you browse. It automatically converts prices from multiple currencies, including USD, EUR, GBP, and more, into bitcoin or satoshis, updating every 5 minutes with real-time data. Switching between bitcoin and satoshis is seamless. 
This is a simple and minimalistic extension, useful for anyone who prefers thinking in bitcoin.
